Key Features of Zurich Travel Insurance
No upper age limit for single trip travel plan
There is no age limit for single trip travel plans, even for elderly aged 76 or above. For Breezy Plan or Elite Plan, the medical cover and accident cover will be deducted, but the other coverages will remain the same. For the Supreme Plan, however, you can enjoy the same coverage as other adults. You can also choose to increase your coverage by purchasing “optional benefit” on personal accident and medical expenses coverage.
Each adult can enjoy one accompanied child for free
Each insurer aged 18 or above can travel with an accompanied child aged 17 or below and enjoy free coverage. The benefits of the accompanied child is 50% of the maximum benefits of an adult. To increase the coverage to 100%, you can purchase "optional benefits".
Supreme Plan offers free cover for Marathon and bike tour
Get “Z” Go Supreme Plan provides free extended protection to the general amateur marathon and bike tours.
FAQ
Does Zurich Travel Insurance offers Covid-19 Coverage?
Yes, Covid-19 related losses, such as Trip cancellations and medical expenses, are covered by Zurich Travel Insurance.
